      • setPxtSessionDelegate

        public void setPxtSessionDelegate(PxtSessionDelegate delegate)
        "Wires up" the PxtSessionDelegate that this service object will use. Note that this method should be invoked by a factory that creates instances of this class, such as a dependency injection container...should one be used (/me/hopes/).
        Parameters:
        delegate - The PxtSessionDelegate to be used.

      • skipCsfr

        public boolean skipCsfr(HttpServletRequest request)
        CSFR check might be skipped for particular POST requests f.e. all login pages
        Parameters:
        request - The current request
        Returns:
        True if CSFR check shall be skipped for current request

      • validate

        public boolean validate(HttpServletRequest request,
               HttpServletResponse response)
        Validate whatever credentials are associated with the request. For hosted, this will be the sso cookie, and for satellite, this will be the pxt cookie. If validation fails, implementors should throw an AuthenticationException. Note that if an implementation does not support/implement this operation, an AuthenticationException should be thrown, and not an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Parameters:
        request - The current request
        response - The current response
        Returns:
        True is validation succeeds, false otherwise.

      • redirectToLogin

        public void redirectToLogin(HttpServletRequest request,
                   HttpServletResponse response)
                     throws ServletException
        Redirects the request to whatever resource handles logins. This method is typically invoked after a call to AuthenticationService.validate(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) fails. Note that the redirect may be client-side or server-side, and it may be to an external or an internal resource.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
        Throws:
        ServletException - If an unrecoverable error occurs

      • redirectTo

        public void redirectTo(HttpServletRequest request,
              HttpServletResponse response,
              java.lang.String path)
                throws ServletException
        Redirects the request to a different page Used in restricted period after grace period has expired to prevent basic satellite functionality
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
        path - where to redirect
        Throws:
        ServletException - If an unrecoverable error occurs

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(HttpServletRequest request,
              HttpServletResponse response)
        Invalidates login credentials associated with the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - The current request
        response - The current response
